ev_simulator_description: This is a simple application that simulates and visualizes EV charging station usage patterns to help optimize charging infrastructure planning.
charging_speed_info: The speed of the chargers to be installed.
num_chargers_info: The number of chargers planning to install.
avg_car_consumption_info: The average energy consumption of cars.
multiplier_info: How likely cars are to arrive at the station.
charging_speed_error: We only support chargers of speeds of 5kW or more
num_chargers_error: Minimum number of chargers to be installed is 2
avg_car_consumption_error: Average car consumption cant be lower than 7kW
